definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: The chassis is constructed with a combination of carbon-fiber and aluminum honeycomb materials.
sentences.chinese: 底盘是由碳纤维与铝蜂窝状复合材料的合金。

sentences.english: The chassis beneath the car comes from an Audi RS 5, with its wheelbase shortened and roof lowered.
sentences.chinese: 底盘沿用奥迪RS5，缩短了轴距，削低了车高。

sentences.english: Fixing-up of underbody part of the car.
The vehicle is heavy-duty base chassis comes from Cadillac designed for coach building.
sentences.chinese: 车辆重型基地底盘来自卡迪拉克专为教练的建筑物。

sentences.english: The truck is improved and refitted from the EQ1141G type Dongfeng lorry chassis.
sentences.chinese: 该车采用东风EQ1141G型汽车底盘改制。

sentences.english: With a sound of groaning metal, the chassis eased upward a few inches.
sentences.chinese: 随着一声金属的哀鸣声，底盘向上送动了几英寸。

sentences.english: In addition, the vehicle chassis system of cleaner and more important.
sentences.chinese: 此外，汽车底盘系统的清洁维护更重要。

sentences.english: The chassis uses the self-propelled – like vehicle to carry, the complete bikes relocation, the migration is good .
sentences.chinese: 底盘采用自走式车载形式，整车搬迁，运移性好。

sentences.english: Unplug the antenna coaxial cable connector from the radio chassis.
sentences.chinese: 从收音机底盘拔开天线同轴导线。

sentences.english: We shifted from a stiffener plate to a stiffer chassis.
sentences.chinese: 我们从一加劲板的更严厉的底盘。

sentences.english: The car bottomed too easily on the bumpy road.
sentences.chinese: 汽车在崎岖不平的道路上行驶，其底盘太容易触地了。

sentences.english: Ultra low chassis measurement. Camber-lifting for adjustment. Electronic leveling function.
sentences.chinese: 超低底盘检测，外倾角升起调整，电子水平功能。

sentences.english: Aluminum chassis with jump bar and double action adjustable aluminum trucks.
sentences.chinese: 跳吧，双可调铝卡车的铝制底盘。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the general situation of the automatic lubrication system used in automobile chassises.
sentences.chinese: 介绍汽车底盘自动润滑系统的一般情况。

sentences.english: Seals underbody , weld joints, trunk interior and firewall of motor vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 汽车底盘，焊缝，卡车内饰等。
